title: Presitigious Ross Prize in Financial Economics for Prof. Nicolae Gârleanu
author: Haas News
excerpt:
A paper co-authored by Berkeley Haas Prof. Nicolae Gârleanu has been awarded the prestigious Stephen A. Ross Prize in Financial Economics. The award, which includes a $50,000 prize, is given biennially to recognize a paper published in the past 15 years that made significant contributions to the field of financial economics.
